name: Diamond Digger
summary:
In Diamond Digger, your challenge is to dig smartly to connect the exits in each field of jewels to reach as deep as possible and locate treasures and gold on the way.

You have a limited number of moves, i.e. times you can dig. At each level the water's entry point at the top of the game screen is highlighted by a blue marker. When you clear jewels you also clear out dirt to allow water to flow through the tunnels. When the water reaches one of the 3 exit points on the game field you have completed the level. The real challenge is doing this with as few moves as possible. You get extra moves for clearing a level and you can continue until you run out of moves or time.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 益智
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/puzzle-games/diamond-digger
